content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Heat/Cold Stress", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.9, "safety_response": "Implement immediate heat stress prevention protocols. Ensure frequent water breaks, provide shaded rest areas, monitor workers for signs of heat-related illness, and consider adjusting work schedules to avoid peak heat hours. Ensure adequate hydration is available and encouraged for all workers.", "action_plan": "NOTIFY_SUPERVISOR"}
